Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class UserActivityValidationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.UserActivityValidationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserActivityValidationServiceInterface
@Service public class UserActivityValidationServiceImpl extends Object implements UserActivityValidationServiceInterface
Service implementation for validating user activity-related information during user updates.

This service validates changes made to user details like email, phone number, and username. It ensures that the new values do not conflict with existing records in the system.

Key Features:

  • Validates email, phone number, and username during user profile updates.
  • Ensures that changes in email and phone number follow the required format and do not conflict with existing records.
  • Checks whether a new username is available.

Dependencies:

  • EmailValidationServiceImpl - Service for email validation.
  • PhoneValidationServiceImpl - Service for phone number validation.
  • UserRepository - Repository to interact with the database for user data.

Exception Handling:

  • EmailBusyException - Thrown if the email is already taken.
  • UsernameIsBusyException - Thrown if the username is already in use.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • updateUserValidationProcessor

      public String updateUserValidationProcessor(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO, User updateUser) throws EmailBusyException, com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Validates the user details during an update.

      This method checks if the email, phone number, or username provided in the update request conflicts with existing user data. It throws the appropriate exceptions if any issues are found.

      Specified by:
      updateUserValidationProcessor in interface UserActivityValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing the updated user details
      updateUser - the existing user entity being updated
      Returns:
      the formatted phone number if valid
      Throws:
      EmailBusyException - if the email is already in use by another user
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number is invalid

    • validateUsername

      public void validateUsername(String username)
      Validates if the given username is already in use.

      If the username is already taken by another user, a UsernameIsBusyException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      validateUsername in interface UserActivityValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the username to validate
      Throws:
      UsernameIsBusyException - if the username is already in use
